title: THE ECOSYSTEM THAT OPTIMALLY COMBINES DIGITAL AND REAL ASSETS
desc: Buy our TRCY Token and profit from unlimited access to our exclusive services, explore our sustainable projects and use your voting power to create an impact through our platform.
trcylab: Traccy Connect enables global investors to invest in high-impact projects in developing countries while addressing social and environmental challenges.
community: As a community member, you benefit from a range of offerings such as project participation, carbon credit offsetting, coaching and impact scoring.
token: Our platform facilitates fast and cost-efficient financing of sustainable initiatives through Security Token Offerings
connect: As a user of Traccy Connect, you can take advantage of exclusive services such as remittance services, direct investments and various DeFi products.
csp1_desc: Get actively involved, influence project goals, decisions and outcomes of impact projects.
csp2_desc: Buy NFTS, access Defi dApps, and explore Web3 across multiple networks
csp3_desc: Buy NFTS, access Defi dApps, and explore Web3 across multiple networks
platform: After registration you will get immediate access to all our services such as peer to peer payments, remittance services, project participation and much more.
